title: Skinny Bean¬Æ Estrogen Enhancement Supplement - Balance Hormones Naturally and Improve Overall Well-Being with Our Unique Formula - Supports Hormonal Health with Epimedium, Dong Quai, Maca, and More - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Support your hormonal health with Skinny Bean® Estrogen Enhancement Supplement. This unique formula is specifically designed to balance estrogen levels, promoting overall well-being and reducing symptoms of hormonal imbalance. Whether you're experiencing menopause or other hormonal fluctuations, our supplement can help alleviate symptoms like hot flashes, mood swings, and more, improving your quality of life.

Key Ingredients and Their Benefits

  • Epimedium Powder (Epimedium sagittatum): Known for its hormone-balancing properties, Epimedium helps support healthy estrogen levels and overall hormonal health.
  • Tribulus Extract (Tribulus terrestris): Enhances hormonal balance and supports reproductive health.
  • Catuaba Powder (Trichilia catigua): Traditionally used for its aphrodisiac properties, Catuaba supports overall vitality and well-being.
  • Dong Quai (Angelica sinensis): Often referred to as "female ginseng," Dong Quai is known for its ability to balance hormones and alleviate menopausal symptoms.
  • Ginkgo Biloba (Ginkgo biloba): Improves blood flow and supports cognitive function, helping to reduce mood swings and enhance mental clarity.
  • Asian Ginseng (Panax ginseng): An adaptogen that helps the body cope with stress and supports overall energy levels.
  • Damiana Powder (Turnera diffusa): Supports hormonal balance and enhances mood and libido.
  • Ashwagandha Extract (Withania somnifera): Reduces stress and anxiety, supporting overall hormonal health and well-being.
  • Ginger (Zingiber officinale): Known for its anti-inflammatory properties, Ginger helps reduce symptoms of hormonal imbalance.
  • Maca (Lepidium meyenii): Supports energy, stamina, and hormonal balance, particularly during menopause.
  • Muira Puama (Ptychopetalum olacoides): Supports overall vitality and reduces symptoms of hormonal imbalance.
  • Velvet Bean Extract (Mucuna pruriens): Enhances mood and supports hormonal health.
  • Asparagus Extract (Asparagus officinalis): Supports reproductive health and hormonal balance.
  • Chinese Smilax (Smilax china): Traditionally used for its detoxifying properties, supporting overall health and well-being.

Why Choose Skinny Bean® Estrogen Enhancement Supplement?

  • Balances Hormones Naturally: Our formula is designed to balance estrogen levels, reducing symptoms of hormonal imbalance and promoting overall well-being.
  • Supports Menopausal Health: Ideal for women experiencing menopause, our supplement helps alleviate hot flashes, mood swings, and other related symptoms.
  • Natural and Safe: Made with high-quality, natural ingredients, our supplement is free from artificial additives, preservatives, and common allergens.
  • Comprehensive Hormonal Support: With a blend of potent herbs and extracts, our supplement provides comprehensive support for hormonal health.
Ingredients: Epimedium Powder, Tribulus Extract, Catuaba Powder, Dong Quai, Ginkgo Biloba, Asian Ginseng, Damiana Powder, Ashwagandha Extract, Ginger, Maca, Muira Puama, Velvet Bean Extract, Asparagus Extract, Chinese Smilax

Achieve Hormonal Harmony Naturally

Incorporate Skinny Bean® Estrogen Enhancement Supplement into your daily routine to balance your hormones naturally and improve your overall well-being. Experience the benefits of reduced symptoms of hormonal imbalance and enhanced quality of life with our unique, natural formula. Achieve hormonal harmony with Skinny Bean® today.
shortDescriptionHtml: Balance your hormones naturally with Skinny Bean¬Æ Estrogen Enhancement Supplement. Our unique formula supports hormonal health and alleviates menopausal symptoms. Achieve overall well-being with natural ingredients like Epimedium, Dong Quai, and Maca. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Serving Per Bottle: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin A (as Beta-Carotene) 50 mcg RAE 6%
Thiamin (as Thiamin Mononitrate) 1.25 mg 104%
Niacin (as Niacin) 1 mg NE 6%
Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCl) 3.8 mg 224%
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin) 54 mcg 2,250%
Pantothenic Acid (as D-Calcium Pantothenate) 2.5 mg 50%
Zinc (as Zinc oxide) 26 mg 236%
L-Arginine (Base) 100 mg †
BioPerine® (Black pepper Extract) (Piper nigrum) (Fruit) †
Proprietary Blend 802 mg †
Epimedium Powder (Epimedium sagittatum) (aerial), Tribulus Extract (Tribulus terrestris L.) (fruit), Catuaba Powder (Trichilia catigua) (bark), Dong Quai (Angelica sinensis) (root), Ginkgo (Ginkgo biloba) (leaf), Asian Ginseng (Panax ginseng) (root), Damiana Powder (Turnera diffusa) (leaf), Ashwagandha Extract (Withania somnifera) (root), Ginger (Zingiber officinale) (root), Maca (Lepidium meyenii) (root), Muira Puama (Ptychopetalum olacoides) (root), L-Phenylalanine, Asparagus Extract (Asparagus officinalis) (stem), Chinese Smilax (Smilax china) (root)

† Daily Value (DV) not established.

Other Ingredients: Rice Flour, Hypromellose (vegetable capsule), Magnesium Stearate (vegetable), Silicon Dioxide.
